props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the code.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the heading.

props.name: marginTop
props.docblock: Pass `default` to use the default margin top for that size.

props.name: rel
props.docblock:
This attribute names a relationship of the linked document to the current document.
Common use case is: rel="noopener noreferrer".

props.name: href
props.docblock: Specifies the URL of the linked resource. A URL might be absolute or relative.

props.name: target
props.docblock: Target atrribute, common use case is target="_blank."

props.name: color
props.docblock: The color (and styling) of the Link. Can be default, blue, green or neutral.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the link.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: When provided, adds a icon before the list item.

props.name: iconColor
props.docblock: The color of the icon.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text used in a list item.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text style.
Can be: 300, 400, 500.

props.name: fontFamily
props.docblock:
Font family.
Can be: `ui`, `display` or `mono` or a custom font family.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text used in a list item.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
When passed, adds a icon before each list item in the list
You can override this on a individual list item.

props.name: iconColor
props.docblock: The color of the icon in each list item in the list.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the tooltip.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the tooltip.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position the Popover is on.

props.name: content
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: hideDelay
props.docblock: Time in ms before hiding the Tooltip.

props.name: showDelay
props.docblock: Time in ms before showing the Tooltip.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When True, manually show the Tooltip.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The target button of the Tooltip.

props.name: statelessProps
props.docblock: Properties passed through to the Tooltip.

props.name: zIndex
props.docblock: The z-index of the toast.

props.name: duration
props.docblock: Duration of the toast.

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock: Function called when the toast is all the way closed.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The type of the alert.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The title of the alert.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Description of the alert.

props.name: hasCloseButton
props.docblock: When true, show a close icon button inside of the toast.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When false, will close the Toast and call onRemove when finished.

props.name: bindNotify
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.notify` function.

props.name: bindRemove
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.remove` function.

props.name: bindGetToasts
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.getToasts` function.

props.name: bindCloseAll
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.closeAll` function.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text style.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: fontFamily
props.docblock:
Font family.
Can be: `ui`, `display` or `mono` or a custom font family.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Makes the textarea element required.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Makes the textarea element disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock:
Sets visual styling of _only_ the text area to be "invalid".
Note that this does not effect any `validationMessage`.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Use the native spell check functionality of the browser.

props.name: grammarly
props.docblock: Allow the Grammarly browser extension to attach to the backing textarea.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the TextInput.

props.name: width
props.docblock: The width of the TextInput.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Whether or not to show an asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: An optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: An optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint. This is unaffected by `isInvalid`.

props.name: inputHeight
props.docblock: The height of the input element.

props.name: inputWidth
props.docblock: The width of the input width.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Makes the input element required.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Makes the input element disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock:
Sets visual styling of _only_ the text input to be "invalid".
Note that this does not effect any `validationMessage`.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Use the native spell check functionality of the browser.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the TextInput.

props.name: width
props.docblock: The width of the TextInput.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: labelFor
props.docblock: Passed on the label as a htmlFor prop.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Whether or not to show an asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: An optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: An optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint. This is unaffected by `isInvalid`.

props.name: inputHeight
props.docblock: The height of the input element.

props.name: inputWidth
props.docblock: The width of the input width.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The tag content

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when the removal icon is clicked.
(event) => void

props.name: isRemovable
props.docblock: Whether or not the tag can be removed.

props.name: addOnBlur
props.docblock: Whether or not the inputValue should be added to the tags when the input blurs.

props.name: className
props.docblock: The class name to apply to the container component.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Whether or not the input should be disabled.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The vertical size of the input

props.name: inputProps
props.docblock: Props to pass to the input component. Note that `ref` and `key` are not supported. See `inputRef`.

props.name: inputRef
props.docblock:
Ref handler for the input element.
(input: HTMLInputElement | null) => void

props.name: onAdd
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when new tags are added.
Returning `false` will prevent clearing the input.
(values: Array) => void | false

props.name: onBlur
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when focus on the input blurs.
(event) => void

props.name: onChange
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when the tag values change.
Returning `false` will prevent clearing the input.
(values: Array) => void | false

props.name: onFocus
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when the input receives focus.
(event) => void

props.name: onInputChange
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when the value of the input is changed. Shorthand for `inputProps={{ onChange }}`.
(event) => void

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock:
Callback invoked when a tag is removed.
Receives value and index of removed tag.
(value: string | node, index: number) => void

props.name: separator
props.docblock: Value or RegExp to split on pasted text or on enter keypress

props.name: tagProps
props.docblock: Provide props to tag component (actually `Badge`, for now).

props.name: tagSubmitKey
props.docblock: Key to press in order to submit a new tag while typing.

props.name: values
props.docblock: Controlled tag values. Each value is rendered inside a tag.

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function triggered when tab is selected.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: When true, the tab is selected.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the tab.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the Tab.
Only use this if you know what you are doing.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the cell can't be edited.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Optional placeholder when children is falsy.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size used for the TextTableCell and Textarea.

props.name: children
props.docblock: This is the value of the cell.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when value changes. (value: string) => void.

props.name: autoFocus
props.docblock: When true, the cell will initialize in the editing state.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Used as the defaultValue of the textarea.

props.name: zIndex
props.docblock: The z-index placed on the element.

props.name: getTargetRef
props.docblock:
Function to get the target ref of the parent.
Used to mirror the position.

props.name: minWidth
props.docblock:
Min width of the textarea.
The textarea can never be smaller than the cell.

props.name: minHeight
props.docblock:
Min height of the textarea.
The textarea can never be smaller than the cell.

props.name: onChangeComplete
props.docblock: Called when the textarea is blurred, pass the value back to the cell.

props.name: onCancel
props.docblock: Called when Escape is hit or componentWillUnmount.

props.name: size
props.docblock: Text size of the textarea.

props.name: handleScrollbarSize
props.docblock: Returns the size of the scrollbar by creating a hidden fixed div.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the cell can't be edited.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Optional placeholder when children is falsy.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size used for the TextTableCell and Textarea.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value of the input.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Handler to be called when the input changes.

props.name: autoFocus
props.docblock: Sets whether the component should be automatically focused on component render.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Sets whether to apply spell checking to the content.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Text to display in the input if the input is empty.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: The MolecularUI or custom icon before the label.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the table row. Default theme only support default.

props.name: rightView
props.docblock:
Optional node to be placed on the right side of the table cell.
Useful for icons and icon buttons.

props.name: arrowKeysOverrides
props.docblock:
Advanced arrow keys overrides for selectable cells.
A string will be used as a selector.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the table cell.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the row. Remember to add paddings when using "auto".

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: onDeselect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: isSelectable
props.docblock: Makes the TableRow selectable.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: Makes the TableRow selected.

props.name: isHighlighted
props.docblock: Manually set the TableRow to be highlighted.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the table row. Default theme only support default.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the table row.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: isNumber
props.docblock: Adds fontFamily: mono.

props.name: textProps
props.docblock: Pass additional props to the Text component.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Children needs to be an array of a single node.

props.name: defaultHeight
props.docblock:
Default height of each row.
48 is the default height of a TableRow.

props.name: allowAutoHeight
props.docblock:
When true, support `height="auto"` on children being rendered.
This is somewhat of an expirmental feature.

props.name: overscanCount
props.docblock: The overscanCount property passed to react-tiny-virtual-list.

props.name: estimatedItemSize
props.docblock:
When passed, this is used as the `estimatedItemSize` in react-tiny-virtual-list.
Only when `allowAutoHeight` and`useAverageAutoHeightEstimation` are false.

props.name: useAverageAutoHeightEstimation
props.docblock:
When allowAutoHeight is true and this prop is true, the estimated height
will be computed based on the average height of auto height rows.

props.name: scrollToIndex
props.docblock: The scrollToIndex property passed to react-tiny-virtual-list

props.name: scrollOffset
props.docblock: The scrollOffset property passed to react-tiny-virtual-list

props.name: scrollToAlignment
props.docblock: The scrollToAlignment property passed to react-tiny-virtual-list

props.name: onScroll
props.docblock: The onScroll callback passed to react-tiny-virtual-list

props.name: textProps
props.docblock: Pass additional props to the Text component.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the radio.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name attribute of the radio.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value attribute of the radio.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the switch.

props.name: checked
props.docblock: When true, the switch is checked (on).

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when state changes.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the switch is disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: When true, the switch is invalid.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the checkbox.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: hasCheckIcon
props.docblock: When true, the switch has a check icon.

props.name: defaultChecked
props.docblock:
When true, the switch is true by default.
This is for uncontrolled usage.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Function that takes the current z-index and returns a React Node.
(zIndex) => ReactNode.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Set the value of the stack. This will increment for children.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the table head.

props.name: accountForScrollbar
props.docblock:
This should always be true if you are using TableHead together with a TableBody.
Because TableBody has `overflowY: scroll` by default.

props.name: delay
props.docblock: Delay after which spinner should be visible.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the spinner.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Children can be a string, node or a function accepting `({ close })`.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the Side Sheet is shown.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: onBeforeClose
props.docblock:
Function called when overlay is about to close.
Return `false` to prevent the sheet from closing.
type: `Function -> Boolean`

props.name: shouldCloseOnOverlayClick
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if clicking the overlay should close the overlay.

props.name: shouldCloseOnEscapePress
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if pressing the esc key should close the overlay.

props.name: width
props.docblock: Width of the SideSheet.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Properties to pass through the SideSheet container Pane.

props.name: position
props.docblock: Positions the sheet to the top, left, right, or bottom of the screen.

props.name: preventBodyScrolling
props.docblock: Whether or not to prevent scrolling in the outer body

props.name: isMultiSelect
props.docblock: When true, multi select is accounted for.

props.name: closeOnSelect
props.docblock: When true, menu closes on option selection.

props.name: selected
props.docblock: This holds the values of the options

props.name: isMultiSelect
props.docblock: When true, multi select is accounted for.

props.name: titleView
props.docblock: Node that is placed in the header section, above the options.

props.name: detailView
props.docblock: Node that is placed right next to the options.

props.name: emptyView
props.docblock: Node that is displayed instead of options list when there are no options.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The title of the Select Menu.

props.name: width
props.docblock: The width of the Select Menu.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the Select Menu.

props.name: options
props.docblock:
The options to show in the menu.
[{ label: String, value: String | Number }]

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called when an option is selected.

props.name: onDeselect
props.docblock: Function that is called when an option is deselected.

props.name: selected
props.docblock: The selected value/values.

props.name: isMultiSelect
props.docblock: When true, multi select is accounted for.

props.name: hasTitle
props.docblock: When true, show the title.

props.name: hasFilter
props.docblock: When true, show the filter.

props.name: filterPlaceholder
props.docblock: The placeholder of the search filter.

props.name: filterIcon
props.docblock: The icon of the search filter.

props.name: onFilterChange
props.docblock: Function that is called as the onChange() event for the filter.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position of the Select Menu.

props.name: detailView
props.docblock:
Can be a function that returns a node, or a node itself, that is
rendered on the right side of the Select Menu to give additional
information when an option is selected.

props.name: titleView
props.docblock:
Can be a function that returns a node, or a node itself, that is
rendered in the header section of the Select Menu to customize
the header.

props.name: emptyView
props.docblock:
Can be a function that returns a node, or a node itself, that is
rendered instead of the options list when there are no options.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: labelFor
props.docblock: Passed on the label as a htmlFor prop.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Whether or not to show an asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: An optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: An optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint. This is unaffected by `isInvalid`.

props.name: inputHeight
props.docblock: The height of the input element.

props.name: inputWidth
props.docblock: The width of the input width.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute for the select.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name attribute for the select.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The options that are passed to the select.

props.name: defaultValue
props.docblock: The initial value of an uncontrolled select

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when value changes.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value of the select.

props.name: required
props.docblock: When true, the select is required.

props.name: autoFocus
props.docblock: When true, the select should auto focus.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: When true, the select is invalid.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the select. The default theme only supports default.

props.name: options
props.docblock: The options for the radios of the Segmented Control.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The current value of the Segmented Control when controlled.

props.name: defaultValue
props.docblock: The default value of the Segmented Control when uncontrolled.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when the value changes.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name of the radio group.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the Segmented Control.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the Segmented Control is disabled.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name attribute of the radio input.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used for the radio.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value attribute of the radio input.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the control.

props.name: checked
props.docblock: When true, the radio input is checked.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when the state changes.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the control. Currently only `default` is possible.

props.name: isFirstItem
props.docblock: When true, this item is the first item.

props.name: isLastItem
props.docblock: When true, this item is the last item.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The unique id of the radio option.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the input is disabled.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the radio.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name attribute of the radio.

props.name: label
props.docblock: Label of the radio.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value attribute of the radio.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock:
Function called when state changes
Signature:
```
function(event: object, checked: boolean) => void
```

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the radio is disabled.

props.name: checked
props.docblock: When true, the radio is checked.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the radio circle. This also informs the text size and spacing.

props.name: isRequired
props.docblock: When true, the radio get the required attribute.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock:
When true, the aria-invalid attribute is true.
Used for accessibility.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the checkbox.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: options
props.docblock: The options for the radios of the Radio Group.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The selected item value when controlled.

props.name: defaultValue
props.docblock: The default value of the Radio Group when uncontrolled.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when state changes.

props.name: label
props.docblock: Label to display above the radio button options.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the radio circle. This also informs the text size and spacing.

props.name: isRequired
props.docblock: When true, the radio get the required attribute.

props.name: position
props.docblock:
The position the element that is being positioned is on.
Smart positioning might override this.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, show the element being positioned.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Function that returns the element being positioned.

props.name: bodyOffset
props.docblock: The minimum distance from the body to the element being positioned.

props.name: targetOffset
props.docblock: The minimum distance from the target to the element being positioned.

props.name: target
props.docblock:
Function that should return a node for the target.
({ getRef: () -> Ref, isShown: Bool }) -> React Node

props.name: initialScale
props.docblock: Initial scale of the element being positioned.

props.name: animationDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the animation.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position the Popover is on. Smart positioning might override this.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the Popover is manually shown.

props.name: trigger
props.docblock: Open the Popover based on click or hover. Default is click.

props.name: content
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
The target button of the Popover.
When a function the following arguments are passed:
({ toggle: Function -> Void, getRef: Function -> Ref, isShown: Bool })

props.name: display
props.docblock: The display property passed to the Popover card.

props.name: minWidth
props.docblock: The min width of the Popover card.

props.name: minHeight
props.docblock: The min height of the Popover card.

props.name: statelessProps
props.docblock: Properties passed through to the Popover card.

props.name: animationDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the animation.

props.name: onOpen
props.docblock: Function called when the Popover opens.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: Function fired when Popover closes.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onBodyClick
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the body is clicked.

props.name: bringFocusInside
props.docblock: When true, bring focus inside of the Popover on open.

props.name: shouldCloseOnExternalClick
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if clicking outside the dialog should close the dialog.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a node or a function accepting `close: func`
and `state: ENTERING | ENTERED | EXITING | EXITED`.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: Show the component; triggers the enter or exit states.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props to be passed through on the inner Box.

props.name: preventBodyScrolling
props.docblock: Whether or not to prevent body scrolling outside the context of the overlay

props.name: shouldCloseOnClick
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if clicking the overlay should close the overlay.

props.name: shouldCloseOnEscapePress
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if pressing the esc key should close the overlay.

props.name: onBeforeClose
props.docblock:
Function called when overlay is about to close.
Return `false` to prevent the sheet from closing.
type: `Function -> Boolean`

props.name: onExit
props.docblock:
Callback fired before the "exiting" status is applied.
type: `Function(node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onExiting
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "exiting" status is applied.
type: `Function(node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onExited
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "exited" status is applied.
type: `Function(exitState: Any?, node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onEnter
props.docblock:
Callback fired before the "entering" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: onEntering
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "entering" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: onEntered
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "entered" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the component.

props.name: is
props.docblock:
Element type to use for the menu item.
For example: `<MenuItem is={ReactRouterLink}>...</MenuItem>`

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: The MolecularUI or custom icon before the label.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the component.

props.name: secondaryText
props.docblock: Secondary text shown on the right.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The default theme only supports one default appearance.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the menu item.

props.name: onKeyPress
props.docblock: Callback to invoke onkeypress

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Flag to indicate whether the menu item is disabled or not

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the menu option.

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: The icon before the label.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the component.

props.name: secondaryText
props.docblock: Secondary text shown on the right.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The default theme only supports one default appearance.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the menu group.

props.name: selected
props.docblock: The current value of the option group.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when selection changes.

props.name: options
props.docblock: List of options rendered in the group.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the menu group.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the menu group.

props.name: background
props.docblock:
Background property.
`tint1`, `tint2` etc. from `theme.colors.background` are available.

props.name: elevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: hoverElevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane on hover. Might get deprecated.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: activeElevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane on click. Might get deprecated.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: border
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, muted, default.

props.name: borderTop
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderRight
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderBottom
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderLeft
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: color
props.docblock: Color of icon. Equivalent to setting CSS `fill` property.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the icon, in pixels.
Blueprint contains 16px and 20px SVG icon images,
and chooses the appropriate resolution based on this prop.

props.name: name
props.docblock: Name of the icon

props.name: title
props.docblock:
Description string.
Browsers usually render this as a tooltip on hover, whereas screen
readers will use it for aural feedback.
By default, this is set to the icon's name for accessibility.

props.name: style
props.docblock: CSS style properties.

props.name: color
props.docblock: Color of icon. Equivalent to setting CSS `fill` property.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
The icon component - whether an MolecularUI icon or a custom icon node:

- If `null` or `undefined` or `false`, this component will render nothing.
- If given a `JSX.Element`, that element will be rendered, with size/color/title props cloned into it
- If given a React element type, it will be rendered with the other icon props
  As a consumer, you should never use `<IconWrapper icon={<element />}` directly; simply render `<element />` instead.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the icon, in pixels.
Icons contains 16px and 20px SVG icon paths,
and chooses the appropriate resolution based on this prop.

props.name: title
props.docblock:
Description string.
Browsers usually render this as a tooltip on hover, whereas screen
readers will use it for aural feedback.
By default, this is set to the icon's name for accessibility.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: labelFor
props.docblock: Passed on the label as a htmlFor prop.

props.name: isRequired
props.docblock: Whether or not show an asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: An optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: An optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint. This is unaffected by `isInvalid`.

props.name: isAstrixShown
props.docblock: Whether or not to show an asterix after the label.

props.name: name
props.docblock: Name attribute of the input.

props.name: accept
props.docblock: The accept attribute of the input.

props.name: required
props.docblock: When true, the file picker is required.

props.name: multiple
props.docblock: When true, accept multiple files.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the filepicker is disabled.

props.name: capture
props.docblock: The capture attribute of the input.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the file picker.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock:
Function called when onChange is fired.
(files: FileList) => void

props.name: onBlur
props.docblock:
Function called when onBlur is fired.
(event: React.FocusEvent) => void

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Placeholder of the text input

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the FilePicker.
Only use this if you know what you are doing.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a string, node or a function accepting `({ close })`.
When passing a string, <Paragraph /> is used to wrap the string.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the Dialog. Used for the button.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the dialog is shown.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the Dialog. Titles should use Title Case.

props.name: hasHeader
props.docblock: When true, the header with the title and close icon button is shown.

props.name: header
props.docblock:
You can override the default header with your own custom component.

This is useful if you want to provide a custom header and footer, while
also enabling your Dialog's content to scroll.

Header can either be a React node or a function accepting `({ close })`.

props.name: hasFooter
props.docblock: When true, the footer with the cancel and confirm button is shown.

props.name: footer
props.docblock:
You can override the default footer with your own custom component.

This is useful if you want to provide a custom header and footer, while
also enabling your Dialog's content to scroll.

Footer can either be a React node or a function accepting `({ close })`.

props.name: hasCancel
props.docblock: When true, the cancel button is shown.

props.name: hasClose
props.docblock: When true, the close button is shown

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: onConfirm
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the confirm button is clicked.
This does not close the Dialog. A close function will be passed
as a paramater you can use to close the dialog.

`onConfirm={(close) => close()}`

props.name: confirmLabel
props.docblock: Label of the confirm button.

props.name: isConfirmLoading
props.docblock: When true, the confirm button is set to loading.

props.name: isConfirmDisabled
props.docblock: When true, the confirm button is set to disabled.

props.name: onCancel
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the cancel button is clicked.
This closes the Dialog by default.

`onCancel={(close) => close()}`

props.name: cancelLabel
props.docblock: Label of the cancel button.

props.name: shouldCloseOnOverlayClick
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if clicking the overlay should close the overlay.

props.name: shouldCloseOnEscapePress
props.docblock: Boolean indicating if pressing the esc key should close the overlay.

props.name: width
props.docblock: Width of the Dialog.

props.name: topOffset
props.docblock:
The space above the dialog.
This offset is also used at the bottom when there is not enough vertical
space available on screen  and the dialog scrolls internally.

props.name: sideOffset
props.docblock:
The space on the left/right sides of the dialog when there isn't enough
horizontal space available on screen.

props.name: minHeightContent
props.docblock:
The min height of the body content.
Makes it less weird when only showing little content.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the dialog container.

props.name: contentContainerProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the content container.

props.name: preventBodyScrolling
props.docblock: Whether or not to prevent scrolling in the outer body

props.name: overlayProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the Overlay component.

props.name: items
props.docblock: The options to show in the menu.

props.name: selectedItem
props.docblock: The selected item when controlled.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when value changes.

props.name: openOnFocus
props.docblock: When true, open the autocomplete on focus.

props.name: initialSelectedItem
props.docblock: Default selected item when uncontrolled.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: itemToString
props.docblock:
In case the array of items is not an array of strings,
this function is used on each item to return the string that will be shown on the filter

props.name: inputProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the input. Use with caution.

props.name: buttonProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the button. Use with caution.

props.name: autocompleteProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the autocomplete component. Use with caution.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Makes the input element disabled.

props.name: isLoading
props.docblock: When true, show a loading spinner. This also disables the button.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the checkbox.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The id attribute of the checkbox.

props.name: label
props.docblock: Label of the checkbox.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value attribute of the checkbox.

props.name: checked
props.docblock: The checked attribute of the checkbox.

props.name: indeterminate
props.docblock:
State in addition to "checked" and "unchecked".
When true, the checkbox displays a "minus" icon.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when state changes.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the checkbox is disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock:
When true, the aria-invalid attribute is true.
Used for accessibility.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the checkbox.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the button.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the button.

props.name: isLoading
props.docblock:
When true, show a loading spinner before the children.
This also disables the button.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: iconBefore
props.docblock: Sets an icon before the text. Can be any icon from MolecularUI or a custom element.

props.name: iconAfter
props.docblock: Sets an icon after the text. Can be any icon from MolecularUI or a custom element.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: An MolecularUI icon or custom icon node. By default it uses CaretDownIcon

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: The MolecularUI icon or custom icon to render

props.name: iconSize
props.docblock: Specifies an explicit icon size instead of the default value

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the button.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the button.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: color
props.docblock: The color used for the badge.

props.name: isInteractive
props.docblock: Whether or not to apply hover/focus/active styles

props.name: src
props.docblock:
The src attribute of the image.
When it's not available, render initials instead.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the avatar.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name used for the initials and title attribute.

props.name: hashValue
props.docblock:
The value used for the hash function.
The name is used as the hashValue by default.
When dealing with anonymous users you should use the id instead.

props.name: isSolid
props.docblock: When true, render a solid avatar.

props.name: color
props.docblock:
The color used for the avatar.
When the value is `automatic`, use the hash function to determine the color.

props.name: getInitials
props.docblock: Function to get the initials based on the name.

props.name: forceShowInitials
props.docblock:
When true, force show the initials.
This is useful in some cases when using Gravatar and transparent pngs.

props.name: sizeLimitOneCharacter
props.docblock: When the size is smaller than this number, use a single initial for the avatar.

props.name: title
props.docblock:
This prop can be either a string or a Node.
It will provide a title for the items

props.name: items
props.docblock: An array of items to be used as options for the select

props.name: selectedItem
props.docblock: The selected Item to be shown on the autocomplete

props.name: itemToString
props.docblock:
In case the array of items is not an array of strings,
this function is used on each item to return the string that will be shown on the filter

props.name: children
props.docblock: Function that will render the 'filter' component.

props.name: itemSize
props.docblock:
The height of each item in the list
Because the list is virtualized this is required beforehand.

props.name: renderItem
props.docblock: Function that returns a component to render the item

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position of the Popover the Autocomplete is rendered in.

props.name: itemsFilter
props.docblock:
A function that is used to filter the items.
It should return a subset of the initial items.
By default the "fuzzaldrin-plus" package is used.

props.name: isFilterDisabled
props.docblock:
Prop that enables and disables filtering
True: Enables Filtering
False: Disables Filtering

props.name: popoverMinWidth
props.docblock: Defines the minimum height the results container will be

props.name: popoverMaxHeight
props.docblock: Defines the maximum height the results container will be

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the alert. When a string is passed it is wrapped in a `<Text size={400} />` component.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The title of the alert.

props.name: hasTrim
props.docblock: When true, show a border on the left matching the type.

props.name: hasIcon
props.docblock: When true, show a icon on the left matching the type,

props.name: isRemoveable
props.docblock: When true, show a remove icon button.

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock: Function called when the remove button is clicked.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the alert.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the alert.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert. This should always be set explicitly.

props.name: hasIcon
props.docblock:
When true, show a icon on the left matching the type.
There is no point not showing this.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the Text.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a string, node or a function accepting `({ close })`.
When passing a string, <Paragraph size={400} color="muted" /> is used to wrap the string.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the CornerDialog. Used for the button.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the dialog is shown.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the Dialog. Titles should use Title Case.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: hasFooter
props.docblock: When true, the footer with the cancel and confirm button is shown.

props.name: onConfirm
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the confirm button is clicked.
This does not close the Dialog. A close function will be passed
as a paramater you can use to close the dialog.

`onConfirm={(close) => close()}`

props.name: confirmLabel
props.docblock: Label of the confirm button.

props.name: hasCancel
props.docblock: When true, the cancel button is shown.

props.name: hasClose
props.docblock: When true, the close button is shown.

props.name: onCancel
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the cancel button is clicked.
This closes the Dialog by default.

`onCancel={(close) => close()}`

props.name: cancelLabel
props.docblock: Label of the cancel button.

props.name: width
props.docblock: Width of the Dialog.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the dialog container.

props.name: position
props.docblock: Props that will set position of corner dialog
